description:
"He`s awakened..."
Mika was seen within the world of PSO2. Aika`s strange behavior after Mika`s return. Itsuki finds the situation suspicious and begins investigating Aika on his own.
But from an outsider`s perspective, it looksl like Itsuki is chasing Aika around.
As Rina and Itsuki make rounds visiting each club`s president to make the after party a reality, Aika occasionally comes up in conversation. Itsuki asks his PSO2 friends and keeps looking for Aika, which irritates Rina.
Meanwhile, they hear rumors that PSO2 players sometimes go missing.
Source: crunchyroll
